title: Fillet steak, pickled walnuts and horseradish
ingredients: good-sized stick fresh horseradish, about 1.5cm/½in wide x 5cm/2in long (longer if you like it hot)
4 fillet steaks, each 250g/9oz, trimmed of any sinew
salt and freshly ground black pepper
9-12 pickled walnuts, plus 1 tbsp of the pickling liquid
